name: sonken
description: Next-generation local development server with integrated APM dashboard

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: node -e "console.log('Installing dependencies...'); require('child_process').execSync('npm install', {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('cd backend && npm install', {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}); require('child_process').execSync('cd frontend && npm install', {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true});"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['node_modules', 'backend/node_modules', 'frontend/node_modules'].forEach(dir => { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { console.log('Removing ' + dir); fs.rmSync(dir, {recursive: true, force: true}); }});"

author: UmutKavil
